summary: Build a multi-page personal portfolio website for Coding Class 10 (PEP), for Vedika Pawar (web developer), using HTML & CSS, including intro, education, skills, image gallery, contact form, and styled layout; ensure no default/template branding like “Caffeine AI app” appears.
architectural_notes: Static HTML & CSS multi-page site (no framework specified)

existing_features.title: Replace all placeholder identity content (e.g., “Alex Johnson”) across the portfolio website with Vedika Pawar’s portfolio identity, explicitly describing her as a Web Developer with 30 years of experience.
Remove all template/platform branding so the site does not show “caffeine.ai” (or “Caffeine AI app”) anywhere in the UI, including the footer link.
Update the site header branding (logo/brand text) to reflect Vedika Pawar’s portfolio (e.g., “Vedika Pawar” or “Vedika Pawar Portfolio”) while keeping existing navigation items and routes unchanged.

Keep the website aligned with the PEP Class 10 project brief by ensuring the content clearly covers: introduction, education details, skills list, image gallery, and a working contact form, with a simple, basic presentation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a multi-page personal portfolio website (HTML & CSS) for Vedika Pawar (web developer) with intro, education, skills, image gallery, contact form, and styled layout
Ensure site branding uses Vedika Pawar name (no Alex) and remove/hide any template branding like “Caffeine AI app” so it looks self-made
